entry.value: ingredients using an allergen
avaiable translations of an ingredient's name
READ ONLY! Snapshot of RARecipe/foodCost.
READ ONLY! Snapshot will not be created if grossPrice is not set in original recipe. A fixed-point number with precision of 2.
Creating an object without setting this value will import numberOfPortionsToSell from recipe. A fixed-point number with precision of 0.
READ ONLY! Snapshot of RARecipe/productionCost.
READ ONLY! Snapshot of RARecipe/name.
READ ONLY! Popularity of recipe relative to other recipes in simulation.
READ ONLY! Profitability of recipe relative to other recipes in simulation.
READ ONLY! Snapshot of RAVatPercentage/percentage.
Passing recipe is obligatory at the moment of creating snapshot. The recipe could be removed later.

Snapshot of RARecipe containing data relevant in computing BCG matrix; editing original recipe will not change data here. To create this object, pass only recipe, simulation and optional numberOfPortionsProduced. Remaining fields will be filled based on recipe fields at the moment of creating this snapshot.
READ ONLY! Snapshot of category name at the moment of creating simulation.
There must be startDate <= endDate
There must be startDate <= endDate
Passing category is obligatory at the moment of creating simulation. The category could be removed later. It is used to verify that all recipes used in simulation are from the same category.
Account of an owner's employee
amount which can be bought by paying RAIngredient/price, a fixed-point number with precision of 3
per 100g
price for a RAIngredient/amount, a fixed-point number with precision of 2
New ingredients that are not related to RARecipeIngredient should have this relationship.
unit in which RAIngredient/amount is given
Deleting RAMenu will also trigger deleting objects connected with this object: RARecipe via recipes
restaurant to which menu is assigned (only if menu is a main one)
Subscription to be bought by owner after the current subscription has expired
Person who bought a license
3-letter ISO code of currency
3-letter ISO code of currency
Deleting RARecipe will also trigger deleting objects connected with this object: RARecipePreparation via preparationSteps, RARecipeIngredient via recipeIngredients, RASubRecipe via subRecipes
gross price, a fixed-point number with precision of 2
A number used to recalculate amount of ingredients for example if ingredientsRatio changes from 1 to 2 tomatoes usage goes from 2kg to 4kg, a fixed-point number with precision of 0
Portions which will be sold after a recipe is prepared, used in recipe profitability calculations, a fixed-point number with precision of 0
S3 bucket key
amount of subRecipe standard portion used, a fixed-point number with precision of 3
The purpose of this entity is to track transactions which create new payment profiles and are to be refunded immediately.
Deleting RARestaurant will also trigger deleting objects connected with this object: RACategory via categories, RAMenu via menus, RAIngredient via ingredients
Value foodcostLowerThreshold can't be higher than foodcostUpperThreshold.
Value foodcostLowerThreshold can't be higher than foodcostUpperThreshold.
Before subscription is downgraded, owner is encouraged to select which restaurants should be subscriptionActive by setting this flag to true.

Number of active restaurants with this flag set to true must be less or equal to maxRestaurants in current subscription product. New restaurant must have this flag set to true. If subscription tier is lowered, all flags are set to false.
Measurement system used in a restaurant. Set at the moment of the creation, cannot be changed later.
amount of subRecipe standard portion used, a fixed-point number with precision of 3
Recipe which is using other recipe
Recipe being used by the other one
3-letter ISO code of currency
If the flag is set to false, only RAOwners who already have this subscription selected can buy it. Unselecting it will cause RAOwner to lose rights to buy it, as he can't select it again.
unlimited if missing
unlimited if missing
unlimited if missing
In months
Each price should have a distinct currency
Change from one subscription to another happens immediately only if they are connected with upgradesFrom/upgradesTo
Change from one subscription to another happens immediately only if they are connected with upgradesFrom/upgradesTo
After creating a product, it shouldn't be changed at all (except for buyable flag)
Notification displayed at the top of page (example: payment has failed)
3-letter ISO code of currency
Number by which an amount needs to be divided in order to convert from the base units to a specific unit
Conversion factor by which an amount needs to be multiplied to be converted to a unit from the main one.
Measurement system to which unit belong to (metric or imperial)
Type of physical property which unit decribe (volume|weight|quantity)
